The Narrative Enneagram has International Certifying Affiliates around the globe. While students from any country are welcome to join our programs offered directly by The Narrative Enneagram, you may browse this page for international options that may better fit your schedule or language needs.

 

Learn more about International Certifying Affiliates.

Page 1 of 1

Instincts and Subtypes (Sept 22-24, 2023)

Sept 22-24

The Subtypes show you how your instinctual survival drive plays out in daily behaviour. You will learn how to work with this knowledge in order to balance your own life, understand why others are so different and create more harmonious relationships.

International Certification Programs English

Rednal, Birmingham, UK

Learn More

Enneagram Intensive (Sept 22 Oct 8)

Sept 22-24; Oct 6-8

22 24 September & 6 8 October 2023: This course offers a full examination of the nine distinct type structures, with expanded attention to the spiritual and somatic aspects of each types. We will also look at relationships.

International Certification Programs English

Pretoria, South Africa

Learn More

Typing Practitioner Training (July 7-22, 2023)

July 7-22

On this course you learn how to interview people effectively to help them discover their Enneagram type. This is the core skill for every professional who works with the Enneagram. Training takes place on the mornings of four days.

International Certification Programs English

Online (UK)

Learn More

Deepening Spiritual Awareness (June 23-25, 2023)

June 23-25

This course follows on from the Intensive, offering further tools that will help you go deeper on your inner development journey.

International Certification Programs English

Rednal, Birmingham, UK

Learn More

Enneagram Professional Training Program 3 (May 23-25, 2023)

May 23-25, 2023

Enneagram Professional Training Program Interview process

International Certification Programs French

Nantes, France

Typing Practitioner Training (May 19-27, 2023)

May 19-27, 2023

On this course you learn how to interview people effectively to help them discover their Enneagram type. This is the core skill for every professional who works with the Enneagram. Training takes place on the mornings of four days.

Deepening Spiritual Awareness (May 6-21, 2023)

May 6-21, 2023

DEEPENING SPIRITUAL AWARENESS will take place over two weekends,
WHEN: 6 7 May 2023 & 20 21 May 2023
TIME: 6 May & 20 May 2023: 9am 5.30pm SAST (South African Time)

Join us on our mission to transform lives and create a more compassionate world.

The Narrative Enneagram is an educational 501(c)3 nonprofit and an IEA Accredited School with Distinction dedicated to advancing human consciousness through our innovative curriculum, grounded in the Narrative Tradition.
